max_snapshot_count.description: Maximum Number of Snapshots to allow.

scheduled_hour.description: Hour of the day to perform the backup.

scheduled_minute.description: Minute of the day to perform the backup.

snapshot.description: Flag to define if the backup is a snapshot.

start_now.description: Flag to Start the Backup now.

administrative_state.description: Date and Time Policy Administrative State.

offset_state.description: Date and Time Policy Offset State.

stratum_value.description: Date and Time Server Stratum Value.

preferred.description: If the NTP Server is Preferred or not.

trusted.description: If the NTP Key is trusted or not.

admin_state.description: Admin State of the Smart Call Home Policy.
Admin State of the Smart Call Home Smart Destination.

rfc_compliant.description: Should the Message be RFC Compliant.

secure_smtp.description: Does the SMTP Server Require Credentials.

admin_state.description: Admin State of the SNMP Policy.
Admin State of the Syslog Policy.

show_milliseconds_in_timestamp.description: Flag to show milliseconds in timestamp.

show_time_zone_in_timestamp.description: Flag to show timezone in timestamp.

admin_state.description: Admin State of the Syslog Remote Destination.

transport.description: Send Syslog using TCP or UDP.

auth_type.description: Type of Authentication to use for the Target System.

configure_terraform_cloud.description: Flag to Enable or Disable Terraform Cloud.

controller_type.description: Type of Controller for the Target Site.

provider_version_apic.description: Provider Version for the ACI Site.

provider_version_ndo.description: Provider Version for the Nexus Dashboard Orchestrator Site.

run_location.description: Will the Code be executed in Terraform Cloud or on the local Machine.

version_apic.description: Version of Code on the Controller.

version_ndo.description: Version of Code on the Controller.

enable_encryption.description: If Encryption should be Enabled or Not.

color_tag.description: Specifies the color of a policy label.

software_version.description: Switch Software Version for Maintenance Group.
